kannada_original: ನಡೆ ಮುಂದೆ ಪಯಣದಲಿ ತಂಗಾಳಿ ಜೊತೆ ನೀನು;
english_transliteration: Naḍe munde payaṇadali taṅgāḷi jote nīnu;
english_translation: Walk forward on the journey, with the cool breeze beside you;
rest a little when your feet are tired.
Proceed like a wave of vitality, like lightning;

kannada_original: ಅರಿ ನಿನ್ನ ಅಮಿತ ಬಲ – ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: ari ninna amita bala – Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: Know your immense strength – Muddu Rāma.
